LanguageData.Axi_SMG_MP7_21CA.label: Heckler and Koch MP7
LanguageData.Axi_SMG_MP7_21CA.description: Originally designed as a rival to FN's P90, the MP7 took on a life of its own as Deutschplan's premier submachine gun. Adored by special operations teams across the galaxy for it's uncanny ability to penetrate body armor in a compact package. Unfortunately, the small fast round it fires means that while the armor penetration is astounding, the damage to soft tissue leaves something to be desired.
